hero.title: 2026 Presidential Race Heats Up as Key Candidates Announce Platforms
hero.excerpt: The presidential race is heating up, drawing unprecedented attention as candidates sharpen their platforms ahead of key primary heats. As policy differences become more pronounced, the competition is expected to intensify in the weeks ahead.
